Other Answers (7) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by 99GSX_EM... Member since: March 23, 2010 Total points: 143 (Level 1) Add Contact Block FWD car- ya don't do doughnuts
RWD car - from a stop turn your wheel all the way to the left/right then give it a little gas then hammer it to the floor
AWD car - It's the hardest to do but the best way to explain it is from a stop turn the wheel all the way to the left/right give it a little gas then hammer it to the floor let off the gas for not even 2 seconds to get your car sideways then hammer it to the floor again. repeat if ya could get it! Using the e-brake wont help you at all so don't pull it.
